dc_title_s: Allegheny National Forest Subsurface Right: Pennsylvania
dc_description_s: This dataset displays ONLY tracts of Federal land of which the subsurface rights have also been acquired by the Federal government. All Federal oil and gas resources are leasable subject to stipulations necessary to mitigate or avoid adverse impacts on surface resource values. An analysis was done on each tract to determine surface occupancy conditions necessary to protect significant surface resource values while providing for the extraction of federally owned oil and gas. Federally owned oil and gas rights within the Wilderness and National Recreation Areas are congressionally withdrawn from mineral entry.
